1.「……<cs_pchero>さま。デモンシーサーを| 倒してくださったようですね: ...<cs_pchero>. I see that you have defeated|Demon Shisa.

3.「この盾の紋章は ラッカラン島の島主| ゴーレック氏に仕える 兵士である証……。:
The emblem on this shield, a soldier in the|service of Shield Island Chief Golek of|Luckland Island... is the same make as the|
|shield I had...

5.<center>……かつて 私は ラッカランの|ゴーレック氏に仕える 女兵士でし: ...I was once a female soldier in the service|of Mr. Gorek of Luckland.

6.<center>その頃 私は 同僚である|ランディという青年と 婚約を交わしたば: At the time, I had just gotten engaged to a|young man named Randy, a co-worker, and was|looking forward to our life together.

7.<center>ですが 任務で モリナラ大森林を訪れた際|私たちは あのデモンシ: But when we visited the Molinara Forest on a|mission, we were attacked by that Demon Shisa.

8.「ランディ……ランディ……。| お願い 目を開けてちょうだい！| ずっと一緒だっ: Randy... please, Randy... open your eyes! You|promised me that we would always be|together...!

10.「あなた ひとりを 死なせたりしないわ。| この世で 結ばれないのなら| せめて: I won't let you die alone. If I can't be with|you in this world, I'll at least be with you|in the next...

13.「あ あなたは……？| どうして 子供が こんな所に……？: What are you...? How did a child end up here?

15.「ボク……帰らなくちゃいけなくて……。| だけど 追いだされちゃったから| ひと: I had to go home but I couldn't go home by|myself because they kicked me out.

17.「おねえちゃん ボクといっしょに| 帰ってくれないかな。おねえちゃんと| いっし: Young lady, will you come home with me? I'm|sure I can go home with you.

18.「そしたら ボク…… おねえちゃんの頼み| どんなことでも きいてあげるから！: And I'll do whatever you ask, young lady!

21.「もう呼びかけても 返事をしないの。| 息も 止まってしまった……。| ランディ: He doesn't answer my calls anymore. He's|stopped breathing... and Randy's not gonna|make it...

22.「おねえちゃんの 願いは| その人を 助けることなんだね？| じゃあ……すこし待: So young lady, your wish is to help that|person, right? Then...wait a bit.

25.「これで ボクといっしょに帰ってくれるよね？: Now you'll come home with me, right?

28.「……すべてを思いだしました。| 何が 私を 世告げの姫として| 動かしていたの: I remembered everything. What was driving me|to become the Oracle Princess.

29.「……この盾は 私の婚約者 ランディの物。| おそらく 魔物に襲われた時に| 落: ...This shield belonged to my fiancee, Randy.|He probably dropped it when he was attacked by|a monster.

30.「ランディが その後 どうしているのか……。| 気がかりですが 私には まだ|: I do wonder how Randy is doing since then, but|I still have my duties to fulfill as Oracle|Princess.

31.「この戦いさえ 終わらせることができれば| 私は 元の女兵士に戻れるでしょう。|: If only I could finish this battle, I would be|a woman soldier again. And then I can be with|Randy again...

32.「これは 決戦をひかえた <cs_pchero>さまへの| はなむけであり 私か: This is a gift to <cs_pchero> for the|upcoming decisive battle, as well as a thank|you from me. Please accept it.

33.「……そろそろ メルエが| <cs_pchero>さまの 訪れを| 待っているこ: ...I'm sure Merue will be waiting for|<cs_pchero> to visit soon.

34.「彼女もまた 過去の記憶を失ったせいで| 心に 迷いを抱えているのかもしれません: She may also be carrying some confusion in her|mind due to the loss of her past memories.|Please help us.
